title: Bug 123727 - 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' do not work
description: The 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' features are not functioning as expected in the chart dialog when using filters.
OB: When using the 'Top N' function and a report parameter in the chart dialogue's 'select data' tab, no data is displayed.
EB: When using the 'Top N' function and a report parameter in the chart dialogue's 'select data' tab, the data should be displayed according to the specified 'Top N' and input parameters.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new data source.
2. Create a new dataset.
3. Create a report parameter.
4. Drag a chart to the layout.
5. In the chart dialogue, click the 'select data' tab.
6. Click the 'filters' button.
7. Set two filter conditions: one using the 'Top N' function and the other using the report parameter.
